SvgSquareComponent

  {{svg-square
    size="number"
    strokeWidth="number"
    rotate="number of degrees"
    radiusX="number"
    radiusY="number"
    fill="color"
    filter="filter id"
    class="class names"}}

_height

Number private

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.RectMixin but overwritten in addon/components/svg-square.js:48

This is a computed property. It sets the height of the square shape based on the size of the svg image element.

String

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:64

The fill color. ` {{svg-triangle fill="blue"}} `

filter

String

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.FilterMixin: addon/mixins/filter.js:20

## Filter The id of the filter to be applied to the svg shape component. Set the id attribute of the filter component... ` {{#svg-filters}} {{filter-drop-shadow id="drop-shadow" dx="2" dy="4"}} {{/svg-filters}} ` ..then set the filter attribute of the SVG shape component to the same value. ` {{svg-triangle filter="drop-shadow"}} `

String private

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.FilterMixin: addon/mixins/filter.js:44

Default: 0

size

Number

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin but overwritten in addon/mixins/rect.js:44

This value is used to multiply the height and width of the svg element. The value is pixels (px). The default is 1. The number can be less than 1, but not less than 0.. You can have a value of 0.5, which will multiply the height and with by 0.5 resulting in the rectangle being scaled down by half. A value of 2, will double its size. The default value of 1 means that the height and width values are not scaled.

Default: 1

stroke

String

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:38

The stroke color. Use this with strokeWidth to set a border around the shape. ` {{svg-triangle stroke="blue" strokeWidth="2"}} `

Default: 'black'

strokeWidth

Number

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:51

The stroke width. Use this with stroke to set a border around the shape. ` {{svg-triangle strokeWidth="2" stroke="blue"}} `

Default: 0

style

String private

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin but overwritten in addon/mixins/rect.js:109

This is a computed property. It sets the height and width of the svg element.
